sud_map.description: You are in the park entrance and hear loud stomps getting closer. You better get moving!
You walked into the main observatory. There is debris all over the place. Watch your step.
You enter the kitchen and see a dinosaur's shadows on the wall. Quick try and hide in the cupboard.
Look the rescue helicopter is over there, but it cant find a safe spot to land. You better keep moving.
Ewww what is that smell? You look around and find a pile of half eaten human bodies.
*RAWR* That must be a T-Rex! Get out of here!
You hide in a porta potty. It stinks, but it beats getting eaten.
Look some hunting rifles. It wouldn't be a bad idea to take these.
'Hey man, can you help us?' You run into some other survivors.
You see a car and start its engine. The engine is loud... maybe that wasn't such a good idea.
You made it to the rendezvous point. Hopefully the helicopter gets here soon!
There's a pack of velociraptors up ahead. Quick hide behind some trees.
You're under a car hiding from a T-Rex, cover yourself in oil so he can't smell you.
You try using your phone to call for help, but you can't get any reception.
*ouch* You roll your ankle in a pot hole.
You feel like this is hopeless and roll up into a ball crying.
